main_definition: in a typical or standard way, without any unusual circumstances.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Typically or usually, in common occurrence or habitual manner.
meanings_and_examples.example: I normally go for a run every morning before breakfast.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In accordance with established standards or expectations.
meanings_and_examples.example: The restaurant serves food in a normally quick and efficient manner, according to our previous visits.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Without any deviations from the usual course of events or behavior.
meanings_and_examples.example: When she arrived on time, it was normal for her not to need directions since she always knows where things are.
